headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://www.googletagmanager.com https://www.google-analytics.com https://www.youtube.com https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: https: blob:; font-src 'self' data:; connect-src 'self' https://www.google-analytics.com https://*.googleapis.com; frame-src 'self' https://www.youtube.com https://drive.google.com; media-src 'self' https:;
